. Lands you right in Orange County, but at present offers few direct flights.
: The three major international airports in the New York City area offer service to just about anywhere.

Ground transportation within Orange County is provided primarily by New Jersey Transit, Short Line bus company, and Metro-North Railroad's Port Jervis Line. Individual cities offer senior citizen buses and car services.

value: File:Bull Stone House New World Dutch barn, Hamptonburgh, NY.jpg
Barn at Bull Stone House, Hamptonburgh, one of the best-preserved Dutch 18th-century barns in the Americas

name=Bannerman Island Cruise and Walking Tour
directions=departs Torches Landing, Newburgh and Beacon Landing, Beacon.
content=Cruise south to the ruins of the Bannerman Castle where you will get off the boat for a 1 1/2 hour guided tour of Bannerman Island by the Bannerman Castle Trust.

content=Cruise the beautiful Hudson River aboard our authentic Mississippi stern driven Paddlewheeler!! Come aboard for a Sightseeing Cruise, Sunday Brunch Cruise, Dinner Cruise, or one of our Dance Party Cruises!!! Charter the River Rose for your next special event. Season runs from May 1st to October 31st.

content=A highly recommended family ski hill. TR offers lessons, rentals, and snow tubing, serviced by a friendly and professional staff. The lodge is a great place to meet new people and to relax after what usually is a long period on the slopes! A must-do if it's cold enough.
name=Church of Saint John the Evangelist

hours= The Church is open Monday through Friday from 6:30 am to 9PM. On Saturday's it's open from about 8AM to 8PM.  On Sundays it is open from 6:30 am to 6:15 pm.  For Mass times please see the parish website.
Sunday 9AM-5PM
content=While it is the oldest Church in Orange County (over 100 years old) it is also known as the first Catholic Church to accept bitcoin donations.
content=Outstanding sushi with friendly staff. Nicely located just off Rt. 17.
